title: Six Candles
description: Abed Nadir’s student film exploring the end of his parents’ marriage, the relationship with his father, and his own place in the world.
quote: I think you are weird, Abed.
studio: Abed is Awesome Productions, Cool Abed Films, A.B.E.D. Pictures Entertainment
altHero: Abed’s head surrounded by MRI scans and a syringe
alt1: Abed’s head on a baby’s body circling the moon in space
alt2: Abed’s father’s head superimposed over Jeff Winger’s body in the study room
alt4: Abed’s father and mother’s heads superimposed over Jeff and Britta’s bodies outside the college
